name: Aya & Naya (+18 Version)
description:
The Story

Aya & Naya are two agents who make a living by stealing access key cards of evil corporations then sell the cards to the police.

The Gameplay

A single player action third-person shooter game with some interactive puzzles, car driving and platforming.

Features:
-Third-person shooter
-Explore beautifully designed sci-fi environments
-Use a variety of firearms (handgun, shotgun, rifle and more!)
-Fight a variety of enemies(militants, cyborg zombies, and special forces!)
-Drive a car to reach your target when the mission requires it
-Thrilling sexy cutscenes before every mission
-A single player action game with some interactive puzzles
-Use close-quarters combat to knock down your enemies
-Sexy 3D female characters
